DataModel

Class AdvertList

  • java.lang.Object
    • DataModel.AdvertList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ObserverPattern.IObserver, ObserverPattern.ISubject

    public class AdvertList
extends java.lang.Object
implements ObserverPattern.ISubject, ObserverPattern.IObserver
    This class represents an AdvertList that stores adverts.
